description:
Meet OSCAR – the new kid on the
block. A great, easy to play
platformer, packed with hours of fun &
zany non-stop action. In psychedelic
worlds of Sweets, Soda Pop,
Fairground Rides, Board Games,
Fairytales and more, meet lots of cool
Toys and Animals in hidden rooms,
Bonus & Bogus mini games and levels.
Use Wings to Fly, Springy Shoes to
Jump and Oscar’s secret magical
Yo-Yo to swing on and zap enemies in
some of the craziest platform levels
you’ll ever play.
name: Oscar in Toyland
